hadiths.text: Narrated Aisha, Ummul Mu'minin: The Prophet (ﷺ) got some ornaments presented by Negus as a gift to him. They contained a gold ring with an Abyssinian stone. The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) turning his attention from it took it by means of a stick or his finger, then called Umamah, daughter of Abul'As and daughter of his daughter Zaynab, and said: Wear it, my dear daughter

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الذَّهَبِ لِلنِّسَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Reported About Gold For Women
